articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.title: Google’s enterprise cloud gets a music-generating AI model - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google has rolled out updates to several of its proprietary media-generating AI models available through its Vertex AI cloud platform.
articles.content:
On Wednesday, Google rolled out updates to several of its first-party media-generating AI models available through its Vertex AI cloud platform.
Lyria, Google’s text-to-music model, is now available… [+2957 chars]
